content: I have been following this guy for a few years mainly because he is a libertarian and a follower of The Austrian School of Economics (the best damn school there is). These are snippets from his appearances on investment shows from 2006-2007. He basically describes exactly what happened to our economy, but did so almost 2 years before is happens. Notice how many of his colleagues are laughing at him in these clips. I don't imagine that they are laughing now. ---http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2I0QN-FYkpw
